# Task Management System

A simple program which manages a user's tasks.

## Application

In this application, users are able to:

- See all tasks
- Create a task
- Edit a task
- Delete a task
- Filter tasks
- Search for a task

### Technologies

- React
- Node
- PostgreSQL
